derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from Teddy, pet form of the given name Theodore: in sense 1 alluding to Theodore Roosevelt, an enthusiastic bear-hunter

entry.tran: 同 teddy bear（常用于儿语）
entry.def: A teddy is the same as a teddy bear. Children often call their teddies 'Teddy' when they are talking to them or about them.

means.word_mean: 1. plaything consisting of a child's toy bear (usually plush and stuffed with soft materials)
